item.title: 42075 First Responder
item.author: orangetrialtruck.nl
item.description: I began my LEGO Technic journey in the summer of 2021 by motorizing the 42075 First Responder set. I added motors for driving and steering, and also installed custom LEDs. Overall, I’m happy with the result as the car has great playability - especially in the dark, thanks to the bright LEDs. Of course, there’s always room for improvement.
